name: Zoom
title: 超远视角（2个按钮和热键变换视角距离）
title_original: Zoom (2 buttons and hotkey to wide zoom)
author: BinbinHfr
description: 仅仅用2个按钮来拉近或拉远视角，可以突破原来游戏的限制从超远视角鸟瞰！热键ALT-Z , 可以直接缩小回原始视角。
description_original: Just 2 buttons to zoom extra wide or close, further than actual gui limits ! And a ALT-Z hotkey to direct zoom out.
